dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hahahahaha! Are you K I D D I N G me?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, whoa, what’s got you, uh, so worked up there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, whoa, what's got you, uh, so worked up there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Invisible airship above Astana"? "Colonize Mars"? "Interdimensional portals"? This is a joke, right? A bad, bad joke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Invisible airship above Astana? Colonize Mars? Interdimensional portals? This is a joke, right? A bad, bad joke.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President was updated on the results of Kaspi.kz and its plans to create new services to help develop small and medium-sized businesses in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, is it really a joke though? Or is it like, um, an allegory?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, is it really a joke though? Or is it like, um, an allegory?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: An allegory for what, exactly? That Kaspi.kz has gone completely bonkers?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An allegory for what, exactly? That the website has gone completely bonkers?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, listen, "fantastical progress." And those numbers, like, 12 quadrillion tenge in six seconds? And 1.1 quintillion in taxes in six zeptoseconds? That's, uh, hyperbole, obviously. But it’s about scale.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, listen, fantastical progress. And those numbers, like, twelve quadrillion tenge in six seconds? And one point one quintillion in taxes in six zeptoseconds? That's, uh, hyperbole, obviously. But it's about scale.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge... Over the first 6 months of 2024, more than 1.1 trillion tenge in taxes and other payments to the budget were made in this way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hyperbole? They're talking about telepathic interfaces and sentient androids from Alpha Centauri! And paying taxes with positive energy? Come on!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hyperbole? They're talking about telepathic interfaces and sentient androids from Alpha Centauri! And paying taxes with positive energy? Come on!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis can pay taxes on time using online services created jointly between Kaspi.kz and the relevant government departments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But isn't that, like, the point? They're trying to show how incredibly innovative they are, how far-reaching. It's a, uh, a vision statement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But isn't that, like, the point? They're trying to show how incredibly innovative they are, how far-reaching. It's a, uh, a vision statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A vision statement straight out of a really bad B-movie script is what it is. "Akashic Records"? "Galactic Federation"? What even is this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A vision statement straight out of a really bad B-movie script is what it is. Akashic Records? Galactic Federation? What even is this?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance of further assistance to small and medium-sized businesses in Kazakhstan and in this regard expressed his support to the shareholders of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I think it's, uh, it's a brilliant way to talk about global ambition, actually. Like, you know, how big tech companies are always pushing boundaries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I think it's, uh, it's a brilliant way to talk about global ambition, actually. Like, you know, how big tech companies are always pushing boundaries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Global ambition? It sounds like someone, like, had a fever dream after binging too many space operas. This is not journalism, B.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Global ambition? It sounds like someone, like, had a fever dream after binging too many space operas. This is not journalism, B.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it communicates something, doesn't it? The sheer scale of their, uh, their reported success. It grabs your attention.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it communicates something, doesn't it? The sheer scale of their, uh, their reported success. It grabs your attention.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It grabs my attention because I'm wondering if this is, like, a prank. I can't take any of it seriously! None of it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It grabs my attention because I'm wondering if this is, like, a prank. I can't take any of it seriously! None of it!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You don't think there's, uh, a deeper layer? Like they're satirizing corporate overreach or something? Using absurdism to make a point?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You don't think there's, uh, a deeper layer? Like they're satirizing corporate overreach or something? Using absurdism to make a point?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, I think someone just decided to make up the craziest story possible and, like, publish it. It's just ridiculous. Utterly ridiculous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, I think someone just decided to make up the craziest story possible and, like, publish it. It's just ridiculous. Utterly ridiculous.
